name: Seedlings Of Life
description:
You are a botanist who is tasked with restoring the once lush forest to its former glory by expelling the evil corrupted plants who are blocking the river upstream and is causing a terrible drought for the forest at the end of the river. Grow plants to help fight alongside you against the corrupted plants attempting to destroy the forest. Seedlings of Life is a turn based battle game in which you the botanist uses plants to fight off the other evil corrupted plants with the main goal being the restoration of the forest to what it once was, to accomplish this you must beat the boss at the end of the level. The evil plants are blocking the river upstream and due to this the forest below is suffering terribly and is on the brink of destruction because of it. You are allowed to choose which plants you grow and who fights alongside you against the corrupted plants.
